SELECT b.bid, b.input_time AS inputTime, b.input_weight AS inputWeight, b.produce_time AS proTime, b.produce_weight AS proWeight, concat(bp.soil, bp.evaluate) AS pattern, b.feed_ids AS feedIds, b.status FROM breed b LEFT JOIN breed_pattern bp ON b.pid = bp.pid where 1 = 1
AND YEAR( b.status ) = #{status}
select timestampdiff(day,b.input_time,b.produce_time) as cycle from breed b where b.bid =#{bid}
